messages.text: Hey, its Eug's Bday, please write something nice for her ğŸ¥º.

Hey EUGE! 

You're pretty cool! I like how you are so wildly inappropriate.  But you always have great energy and are always considerate ğŸ˜ã€‚Excited to see how you and Daniel will grow in your relationship with each other and with God. And all the rectal examinations you'll do. Thanks for the chocolate croissant by the way. Excited for the adventures we'll do in the future! Wishing you the bestest birthday!
PS this is not AI or automated, unlike Daniel's

hey eug!!! oh my gosh its ur birthday. i feel like its only been last week that we were there to witness your absolutely amazing reaction to getting proposed on with the one piece and that random blue jacket. honestly i don't even know where to begin but thanks for being such a legendary friend. i feel like you bring so much joy to everyone around you and everytime i see you i just can't stop laughing like crazy. from racing to pho noc yen and world on yonge, to biking in amsterdam, to night calls with daniel giving me advice for more than one stuff, i want you know that i really appreciate how funny and caring you are. happy birthday eug and cheers ğŸ‘€ to many more years of friendship!
ps this message has been written without the use of any artificial intelligence, or automation, unlike daniel :p
pps this is my joke jonathan stole it

Happy birthday eug!!! Can you believe you're almost hitting 30? LOL jk I am too, and many people say 30s is when we peak so cheers to peaking next year! 

 So grateful for another year that I've been blessed by your friendship ğŸ«¶ğŸ» you never fail to make me laugh, encourage me through hardships, and diagnose all the illnesses that I have. So excited to celebrate your birthday with you and cannot wait for what adventure we go on next!! ğŸ‘€

My love, Eugenia, Happy Birthday!! ğŸ’›

 Iâ€™m so thankful for you, and for the friendship weâ€™ve built over the years. Iâ€™ve loved getting to make so many memories together, especially with you, Jordan, and Daniel. Whether itâ€™s random hangouts, trying out new foods, or our Vancouver trip, those moments have honestly been some of my favourites.
Itâ€™s been really beautiful watching how much youâ€™ve grown!!!  Iâ€™ve seen so much growth especially in your faith and in how youâ€™ve walked through so many changes this past year. Moving back to Mississauga, navigating things with your parents, and now stepping into this new season with Daniel are some big changes that youâ€™ve been going through and youâ€™ve handled it all with such grace, faith, and strength.

You and Daniel complement each other so well with your humour, care for each other, and itâ€™s been amazing seeing you two grow together while serving and building community. Iâ€™m so excited for all thatâ€™s ahead: the wedding planning, the marriage, and everything God has in store for you both.

Praying this next year brings you even more joy, peace, and little reminders of how deeply loved and supported you are by God and by everyone around you. So proud of who you are, Eug, and grateful I get to call you a friend and a sister ğŸ’› To more cheers ğŸ‘€!!!! OKEY OKEY OKEY ğŸ¤©

MY LOVE! HAPPY HAPPY BIRTHDAY ğŸ¥³ What a beautiful day to celebrate the most beautiful girl  Eugenia you truly have a heart of gold and are one of the best friends a person could have. Your genuine care for your friends and patients are so evident by how you check-in, how your remember, and you have this special gift of making those around you so loved. I LOVE laughing with you, joking with you, having picnics with you and just calling / texting with you to catch up. I love how you are SO CHILL always, even though you literally save lives and are actually a HUGE deal, yet you're so welcoming and down to earth. Words cannot fully express how much I love you, but know that it's A LOT and I am forever grateful that God let me meet a sister in Christ like you. Here's to many more years of celebrating your beautiful God glorifying life together. I love you â¤ï¸
Hi, Eug! May your birthday sparkle with God's love and a little extra frosting on top!
Happy Birthday Eugenia! You're such an amazing, kind, and funny friend! I hope your day is filled with love and laughter celebrated with the people around you, you deserve the best! Love ya

Hey my love, happy 29th birthday <3 I am so glad that I could celebrate this special day with you and so many of your special friends in the special hood that we may end up in soon eating lots of special food.

You are truly truly such an awesome girl and I am so thankful that God has brought you into my life. I love you very much and every moment spent with you just feels so easy and fun. Your presence never fails to make a bad day a much better one, and your 1000000 decibel laugh always brings a big fat smile to my big fat face. I am very excited to call you my FIANCE especially when you said WHAT THE FRICK (yes) to WILL EUG WILL MARRY YE ğŸ’ğŸ¥º.

Thank you for always being so willing to serve with me at LivingStones and always being down to talk about the silliest things to the deepest things. I also truly admire your empathy towards others and how you deeply care for your friends / family. I have a lot to learn from you.

Cheers to another year around the sun my love, I look forward to serving God's kingdom with you each day and catching many noise complaints from our neighbours in Rochasesvalle ğŸ˜š.

Much Muahâ€™s!
Dan
